<js>result.replace(/^(\d+)、第.+章/,'第$1章').replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ').replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章').replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1').replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ').replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1').replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章').replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')</js>

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.lastChapter:
<js>
time=Math.round(new Date()/1000)
sign=java.md5Encode("com.ruffianhankin.meritreader1"+time+"vhjJVz1St6tK7!8n#B0MqRIuE2Dh7!C#")
headers={"package":"com.ruffianhankin.meritreader","pt":"1","time":String(time),"sign":String(sign)}
option={"headers":headers}
resp=JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://book.lansheweb.com/details/"+parseInt(java.getString('$.book_id')/1000)+"/"+java.getString('$.book_id')+".html,"+JSON.stringify(option))).data;
resp.last_chapter_name+" • "+resp.updated_at
</js>
<js>result.replace(/\s\d+:\d+:\d+/,'')</js>
<js>result.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')</js>
<js>result.replace(/^(\d+)、第.+章/,'第$1章').replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ').replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章').replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1').replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ').replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第?.+章/,'$1').replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章').replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')</js>
